product_name: The North Face Mazino Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: Equipped with pit zips for easy venting, The North Face Mazino Rain Jacket for women is waterproof and breathable and stows in its own pocket so it fits handily into your pack. HyVent(R) 2.5-layer polyester fabric is seam sealed, waterproof/breathable and windproof. Adjustable hood and elastic at rear hem help seal out weather. The North Face Mazino Rain Jacket for women has zippered hand pockets; a subtle half-layer print and contrasting-color zippers give it style.
short_description: Equipped with pit zips for easy venting, The North Face Mazino Rain Jacket for women is waterproof and breathable and stows in its own pocket so it fits handily into your pack.
